grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 般若【ハンニャ】prajna, wisdom required to attain enlightenment, noh mask of a grinning, horned demoness (represents a woman's rage and jealousy), family crest designed after the Hannya noh mask, dreadful face (esp. of a woman driven mad by jealousy), terrifying facial expression
過般【カハン】some time ago, recently
